recipes.title: Mexican fish tacos
recipes.subtitle: WITH CHARRED PINEAPPLE SALSA
recipes.comment: I've served these incredible fish tacos with all the trimmings - chunky guacamole, sweet pineapple salsa, garlicky sour cream and a jalapeño spiked slaw - this is to die for.

recipes.ingredients:
• 1 x 400g tin of cannellini beans
  • 8 large quality flour tortillas
  • Olive oil
  • 4 x 200g haddock fillets, skin on, scaled and pin-boned
  • 1 lemon
  • A few sprigs of fresh mint

    WHITE GARLIC SAUCE

  • 1 bulb of garlic
  • 150ml sour cream
  • 1 lime
  • A few sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley

recipes.title: Goodness breakfast with maple pears
recipes.comment: A bit of toasting the night before will give you a wholesome base for a quick and warming breakfast. Top with fruit, yoghurt, seeds or nuts to change things up.

recipes.ingredients:
• 100g oats
  • 100g millet flakes
  • 100g barley flakes
  • 100g quinoa
  • 40g pumpkin seeds
  • 40g sesame seeds
  • 800ml - 1 litre almond milk
  • flaked almonds

    MAPLE PEARS

  • 2 pears
  • 1 tablespoon maple syrup, plus extra to serve

recipes.title: Eton mess
recipes.subtitle: A BRITISH FAVOURITE
recipes.comment: Eton mess is such a classic old-school dessert - whack this in the middle of the table and everyone will go crazy!

recipes.ingredients:
• 6 large free-range egg whites
  • 300g golden caster sugar
  • 1 big pinch of sea salt
  • 500g mixed fresh berries
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste
  • 1 splash of balsamic vinegar
  • 1 vanilla pod
  • 250ml double cream
  • 1 tablespoon icing sugar
  • 250g fat-free Greek yoghurt
  • 2 tablespoons hazelnuts, optional
  • 50g dark chocolate
